pages.text: The $(4)Sigil of Decayed Blood$() binds your soul to a specific point in existence. It remembers the scent of your essence, no matter how far you wander.
By $(6)Sneak-Right-Clicking$(), you can anchor your current position within the sigil. The blood within the plate will begin to decay, forever marking that spot as your $(n)sanctuary$().

A simple $(6)Right-Click$() thereafter will tear through the fabric of reality, pulling you back to your mark $(l)instantly$()â€”even from across different dimensions. Distance is now $(4)irrelevant$().
